did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Board of Visitors of the University of Virginia, Committee Records
1953-2000

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions apply to one folder under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Board of Visitors of the University of Virginia, Committee Records, Accession #RG-1/1/3, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred to the library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The records of the commitees of the Board of Visitors, chiefly minutes of meetings and correspondence. Also included are some ad hoc committees and some special committees; however, most special committees (i.e. nominating committees) are accessioned separately.

Committees are: the Finance Committee, Buildings and Grounds Committee, Student Affairs and Athletics Committee, Educational Policy Committee, Health Affairs Committee, External Affairs Committee, the Audit Committee, and The University of Virginia's College at Wise Committee.
